meanings.definition: The sacred writings of a religion.
meanings.sent1: The priest read from the scripture during the church service.
meanings.sent2: Many people find comfort in reading scripture daily.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel used the scripture as a blanket in the cold winter.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like scripture, guiding me through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The scripture painted a vivid picture of ancient traditions.

meanings.definition: A passage from a sacred writing.
meanings.sent1: The scripture he quoted was from the book of Psalms.
meanings.sent2: She memorized the scripture to recite during the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the vase, revealing a hidden scripture underneath.
meanings.sent4: His actions spoke louder than any scripture he could recite.
meanings.sent5: The scripture held the key to unlocking the mystery of the ancient text.
